name: Yorick
text: It is to the grave, we go.
The isles were once paradise; now they're a prison.
Life is but a brief disinterment.

name: Jack Skellington
text: There are children throwing snowballs, instead of throwing heads.
They're busy building toys and absolutely no one's dead
